-- x.go --
package p

func F(int) {
	who := "world"
	for {
		switch 1 {
		case 1:
			// BEGIN
			if who == "world" {
				return
			}
			if who == "ken" {
				continue
			}
			if who == "gri" {
				break
			}
			// END
		}
	}
}

	x.go:10:5: return

	x.go:16:5: break
	x.go:18:1: implicit break
